subject: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Sir,
A great news today that Apex board have included your name among the
old contractors to receive their long overdue contract benefit
through approve ATM CARD which they have directed my office to pick it
up from designated commercial bank  here to dispatch  into your
address Just to inform you that first thing tomorrow morning working
time i will direct our dispatcher rider to move to the commercial bank
to pick it up after that i will scan and send a copy for your own
perusal until such a time you are ready to send money to pay for
courier delivery charges into your address i have done my part since
over two months now I have been pushing the board of Central Bank on
your behalf to accept and give approval to this process which i
believe it cost nothing than only delivery fee to get it across to you
.
For your information they have also remove insurance fee including the
access code fee code to your ATM card which is a good welcome
development  it is left for you now to decided if you are ready to
send fee for DHL or FedEx courier delivery to pick the ATM CARD UP for
your information you can pay for any of the mentioned courier delivery
charges in your country of Origin and give instruction to them to pick
up the parcel containing your ATM CARD in Nigeria you can as well send
me the proof of delivery payment you make in any of their office to
present to their office here. i am only suggesting this method just to
prove to you that nobody is after your money or to collect your money
without delivering your ATM CARD because of your past experience.
Once again congratulation on this new development.
Waiting for urgent action .
Daniel Taraba

subject: Re:   Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Daniel Taraba,

Thank you for your email. I am glad to hear that my name has been included to receive the overdue contract benefit through an approved ATM card. 

However, before we proceed, I would like to clarify a few things. Could you please provide more details about the delivery fee? How much is it and how should it be paid? Also, could you please explain more about the insurance fee and access code fee that have been removed?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jason
